description:
In this course titled 'Hypnosis- Manage Chronic Fatigue Syndrome .' By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn -

  • The psychological reasons behind the problem of chronic fatigue syndrome
  • You will be able to manage the problem of fatigue with the powerful techniques of self hypnosis, visualization, imagery and affirmations
  • You will be able to relax instantly using self hypnosis techniques
  • You will be able to reduce stress, depression , insomnia and negativity using powerful self hypnosis and affirmations

This course is a must for those who feel they are suffering from fatigue and are completely negative because they are unable to reduce the pain mentally and physically

It is ideal for everyone who want to get rid of chronic fatigue and improve their mental health

This course contains a lot of exercises and more than 30 minutes of live video content designed over 9 lectures in English including bonuses.

This course contains-

Lecture 1:Introduction

Lecture 2:Remove Myths About Self Hypnosis

Lecture 3:Conscious Mind Vs Subconscious Mind

Lecture 4:How To Enter Into The State Of Self Hypnosis

Lecture5:How To Master Self Hypnosis To Reprogram Your Subconscious Mind

Lecture 6:Guided Visualization Exercise: To Manage Chronic Fatigue

Lecture 7:Summary

Lecture8:Bonus Exercise - Affirmations For Depression, Stress, Insomnia And Negativity

Lecture 9:Bonus Exercise : General Healing Audio File
title: Hypnosis- Manage Chronic Fatigue Syndrome
